addressLine1.error: Enter your business' street name and number.
addressLine1.label: **Address Line 1**

addressMunicipality.label: City
addressMunicipality.infoAlert: **Can't find your city?** Unincorporated places are not listed here. Search for [your official jurisdiction](https://www.nj.gov/nj/gov/county/localities.html) (type in your community's name into the local name field).

foreign.label: **Postal Code**
foreign.errorIntl: Enter a 1 to 11 digit Postal Code.

agentNumber.error: Enter the 4 to 7 digit Registered Agent ID number.
agentNumber.label: **Registered Agent ID Number**

agentEmail.label: **Registered Agent Email**
agentEmail.error: Confirm the email matches format: name@example.com

agentOfficeAddressLine1.label: **Office Address Line 1**
agentOfficeAddressLine1.error: Enter the agent's office street name and number.

annualReportNotification.checkboxText: I want to be reminded of any Annual Reports Filing(s), so that I never miss an Annual Report deadline.

businessName.alertUnavailable: Sorry, "${name}" isn't available. Try another name. You can officially form your business once you've found an available name.
businessName.alertAvailable: "${name}" is available. This name will be registered with the State ONLY after you submit the rest of this form.
businessName.alertSpecialCharacters: "${name}" contains invalid special characters that cannot be used in the Business Name for online filing. If you'd like to use special characters you need to file a paper application using the form located at [treasury.](https://www.state.nj.us/treasury/revenue/pdf/2000.pdf)
businessName.alertDesignator: It looks like there's a designator in your name like LLC, LP, or CORP. Please remove it and try your search again. You can officially form your business and choose a designator once you find an available name.
businessName.alertRestrictedWord: "${name}" contains the restricted word "${word}" that cannot be used in the Business Name for online filing. If you would like to use this restricted word, please contact us with your preferred name at [treasury.](https://www.state.nj.us/treasury/revenue/revgencode.shtml)
businessName.errorInlineUnavailable: This name is already being used. Try another business name.
businessName.errorInlineEmpty: Enter a business name to check availability.
businessName.errorInlineNeedsToSearch: Confirm the availability of your business name.
businessName.label: Business Name Search

businessPurpose.label: **Business Purpose**
businessPurpose.body: Describe your business' primary activities but refrain from using any `reserved words.|reserved-words` This allows your business to be searchable on the Public Record.

businessStartDate.errorFuture: The business formation start date must be today or a future date in format MM/DD/YYYY.
businessStartDate.errorToday: The business formation start date must be today and in format MM/DD/YYYY.
businessStartDate.error30Days: The business formation start date must be today or a future date within 30 days in format MM/DD/YYYY.
businessStartDate.error90Days: The business formation start date must be today or a future date within 90 days in format MM/DD/YYYY.
businessStartDate.label: `**Effective Date**|effective-date` (mm/dd/yyyy)

canGetDistribution.body: Do limited partners have the right to receive distributions from a partner? (This can  include a return of all or any part of their partner's contributions).
canGetDistribution.reviewStepYes: **Yes**, the limited partners have the right to receive distributions from a partner. (This can  include a return of all or any part of their partner's contributions).
canGetDistribution.reviewStepNo: **No**, the limited partners do not have the right to receive distributions from a partner. (This can  include a return of all or any part of their partner's contributions).

canMakeDistribution.body: Do general partners have the right to make distributions to any partner? (This includes a return of all or any part of the partner's contributions).
canMakeDistribution.reviewStepNo: **No**, general partners do not have the right to make distributions to any partner. (This includes a return of all or any part of the partner's contributions).
canMakeDistribution.reviewStepYes: **Yes**, general partners have the right to make distributions to any partner. (This includes a return of all or any part of the partner's contributions).

canCreateLimitedPartner.body: Can limited partners assign other partners limited partner rights?
canCreateLimitedPartner.reviewStepNo: **No**, the limited partners cannot assign other partners limited partner rights.
canCreateLimitedPartner.reviewStepYes: **Yes**, the limited partners can assign other partners limited partner rights.

combinedInvestment.body: List the funds and the value of properties and services each of the partners have agreed to contribute.

corpWatchNotification.checkboxText: I want to sign up for CorpWatch Alerts to notify me when any charter document filing is performed for my business.

directors.successSnackbarBody: A director has been added successfully.

dissolution.body: When and under what circumstances can a limited partnership and its affairs dissolve?

foreignDateOfFormation.label: **Original Date of Formation** (mm/dd/yyyy)
foreignDateOfFormation.error: The business formation date must be a valid date in format MM/DD/YYYY

incorporators.successSnackbarBody: A signer has been added successfully.

members.successSnackbarBody: A member has been added successfully.

provisions.body:
Outline your company's functional and financial decisions to help run the internal operations of the business. Provisions help you prevent personal legal liabilities and clarify members' rights and duties to the company to prevent misunderstandings. You can list up to 10 provisions.

Corporations may include a `class of shares|shares-class` structure and details on the rights of the Board of Directors to determine the different classes.
provisions.label: **Additional Provision/Article** (Optional)

signers.errorBannerSignerName: One or more Signer fields are empty.
signers.errorBannerCheckbox: Sign by clicking the checkbox(s) below.
signers.errorInlineAdditionalSignerName: Enter the first and last name of each signer.
signers.aidText: By checking this box I confirm that I'm an authorized signer.

withdrawals.body: If a general partner withdraws from the partnership, what are the remaining partners rights to contribute to the business?

addressLine1.label: **Address Line 1**
addressLine1.error: Enter your street name and number.

partnershipRights.label: **List the applicable terms**
partnershipRights.radioNoText: No, they do not have the right

registeredAgent.sameAddressCheckbox: The address is the same as the business location.
registeredAgent.sameContactCheckbox: The agent information is the same as the account holder.

errorBanner.genericApiError: Review the information in the fields below for errors:
errorBanner.errorOnStep: Review the information in the fields below for errors or omissions:
errorBanner.incompleteStepsError: Check the steps below for missing information or errors:

legalStructure.warningModalHeader: You Might Need a Different Form
legalStructure.warningModalBody: If you change your proposed business structure in the Navigator profile, you might need to complete a different form. Don't worry, once you update your profile we'll tell you which form you need and where to complete it.

general.amendmentInfo:
#### Confirm everything is accurate before submitting. 

 If you need to make a change after submitting, you will need to file a [paper amendment.](https://www.njportal.com/DOR/BusinessAmendments/Forms/IdentifyBusiness)
general.paymentDisclaimer: You will be brought to a secure payment platform operated by New Jersey's partner NICUSA Inc. to process your payment.
